item.description:
Originally this event was going to be on Thursday night but the Braintree HS track is not available Tues and Thurs nights & Weymouth HS track is in use every week night.

To get everyone ready for a 5K, event we will be posting training events using the "Couch to 5K" training schedule. This link is posted on the message board under "training for a 5K" along with information on the October 4th 5K in Braintree.

Joggers and walkers of all levels are welcome to join us at your own pace.

Week one training went great. It was so encouraging for me in the early stages of training to see experienced runners finishing a full 3 miles! SO, we thought we could open this up more than just week 2 training (but I will have the whistle for people who want to follow the schedule).

Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!

Wednesday, July 22nd
7pm
Braintree High School
Track

Fee: Annual Members - FREE, Members and Guests - $2 per person

Organizer(s): Julie & Amanda

Min/Max: At least 6 Yes RSVPs by 12pm/Noon on Wednesday, July 22nd. Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Wednesday, July 22nd.

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do our best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 2pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board. You may click on the following link. http://fitness.meetup....
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the track.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 5K training week 2, (Walker or Joggers Welcome!)
